column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=What do you feel are the three most important issues to voters in your riding ?
#Text=Are these the same top three issues that are most important to you ?
#Text=What would you do to address these issues ?
#Text=Whichever issues are important to the public are important to me .
#Text=I believe three of the biggest right now are health , education , and climate change .
#Text=My stance on each issue would be :
#Text=Health -
#Text=There are two priorities here .
#Text=First , we must ensure that no more hospitals are built with private involvement .
#Text=The citizens of Ontario want a fully public health system , not decades of obligation to private companies .
#Text=Second , we must focus more on prevention and healthy lifestyles , to prevent diseases before they occur rather than treating them after the fact .
#Text=Unhealthy lifestyles are placing a huge burden on our health system and are part of the reason the system is under so much financial strain .
#Text=Education - Parents should not have to fundraise for their children 's education -- that 's not the meaning of " publicly funded " .
#Text=We need to find more money , and we ca n't take it from other areas that need it either .
#Text=This is why I support a single public school system .
#Text=Merging our school boards will save hundreds of millions of dollars , which can be used to restore important school services that have been eroded through years of cost-cutting .
#Text=Climate Change - We need to take immediate action to reduce greenhouse gas emissions .
#Text=This is not as tough a problem as some people make it out to be , because they are so many different things we can do to make a difference .
#Text=We need to reduce energy consumption and increase efficiency ( Canadians are some of the world 's worst energy-wasters ) by setting tougher standards on appliances , homes , and technology .
#Text=We need to reduce our use of cars by encouraging carpooling and transit , as well as making communities walkable .
#Text=What should be the first order of business in the 39th Legislative Assembly ?
#Text=The issue that requires the most immediate attention is climate change .
#Text=The road to sustainability is a long one , so we need to begin immediately .
#Text=We need to set the tone and show the rest of Canada that Ontario will be leaders in halting and reversing climate change .
#Text=Are the property taxes in your riding at a fair level for the amount of services received in the municipality ?
#Text=This is a difficult question because there are so many variables .

#Text=We could be more efficient in how we deliver some services ( such as education , where there is so much duplication between the two school boards ) , while other services are being delivered extremely well .
#Text=It would n't be fair to paint everyone with the same brush .
